org.oxcart.streams

Class ChecksummingInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.oxcart.streams.IValidatingInputStream
        • org.oxcart.streams.ChecksummingInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ChecksummingInputStream
extends IValidatingInputStream
    An IValidatingInputStream that wraps another input stream and validates against a provided checksum.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChecksummingInputStream(java.io.InputStream originalStream, java.lang.String digestAlgorithm, byte[] expectedChecksum)
      Construct a ChecksummingInputStream that wraps the given originalStream and calculates a message digest using the specified algorithm.
